SEARCH
Package hms.boundary.doctor

Class ScheduleView

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
hms.boundary.doctor.ScheduleView
public class ScheduleView extends View
The ScheduleView class is responsible for displaying a doctor's schedule, including their appointments, both confirmed and scheduled on a specific date. It provides methods for displaying appointment details and checking whether appointments exist on a given date.

  • Method Details

    • displayHeader

      public void displayHeader()
      Displays the header for the schedule view.
      Specified by:
      displayHeader in class View

    • displayAppointments

      public void displayAppointments(Doctor doctor, LocalDate date, PatientRepository patientRepository)
      Displays the appointments for a specific doctor on a given date. If no appointments exist for the given date, a message indicating that no appointments are scheduled is shown.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose appointments are being displayed.
      date - the date for which the appointments are being displayed.
      patientRepository - the repository that provides access to patient information.

    • displayUpcomingAppointments

      public void displayUpcomingAppointments(Doctor doctor, PatientRepository patientRepository)
      Displays a list of upcoming confirmed appointments for the doctor. If there are no upcoming appointments, a message is shown indicating that there are no upcoming appointments.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose upcoming confirmed appointments are being displayed.
      patientRepository - the repository that provides access to patient information.
